title: Mini Insulated Tumbler with Handle ? Stainless Steel Travel Mug with Straw Lid (Hot & Cold) (480ml)
description:
Meet your new favorite drink companion: the Mini Insulated Tumbler with Handle, designed for convenience, portability, and temperature control. With a 480ml capacity, this compact tumbler is ideal for your morning coffee, afternoon tea, or chilled smoothies.

Crafted from durable stainless steel, it features double-wall insulation to keep beverages hot or cold for extended periods. The ergonomic side handle makes it easy to carry, while the leak-resistant straw lid ensures mess-free sipping wherever you go.

Available in a range of stylish colors?pink, blue, black, white, and cream?this tumbler adds a pop of personality to your daily routine. Whether you're commuting, working from home, or heading to the gym, it?s the perfect size to keep you refreshed without taking up too much space.

COLORS : RANDOM
